tool_description: SerieA Live Scores API allows to retrieve current season results, scorers, lineups, substitutes, events, statistics, odds and much more all with live updates, for the top professional Italian football league. And more is coming...
name: SerieA Live Scores
title: SerieA Live Scores

api_list.name: Team
api_list.description: Returns info about the team

api_list.name: Venue
api_list.description: Returns venue data

api_list.name: Players Statistic Table
api_list.description: Return the players table for a specified statistic. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Match day number from which compute the table

optional_parameters.name: player
optional_parameters.description: Player name

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Team name

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Match day number till which compute the table

api_list.name: Teams Statistic Table
api_list.description: Teams table for a specified statistic. Not available for BASIC plan.

optional_parameters.name: avg
optional_parameters.description: Set to true if you want average statistic value, that is the table computed as (total value statistic/played games). Default false.

optional_parameters.name: frmo
optional_parameters.description: Match day number from which to compute the table

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Set with top to get the top 5, with bottom to get the worse 5 teams (default top)

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Team name

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Match day number till which compute the table

api_list.name: Referees Statistics
api_list.description: Referees statistics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://heisenbug-seriea-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/serie-a/table/referee"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heisenbug-seriea-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://heisenbug-seriea-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/serie-a/table/referee"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "heisenbug-seriea-live-scores-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Player details
api_list.description: Returns all data about a player. Available only with ULTRA and MEGA plans!

optional_parameters.name: honours
optional_parameters.description: Return only the honours for the player (default false)

api_list.name: Season matches results
api_list.description: Returns season matches results

optional_parameters.name: team1
optional_parameters.description: Returns all matches with team1

optional_parameters.name: team2
optional_parameters.description: Returns all matches with team2

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Return only playing matches with live updates (default false)

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Returns all matches for the date (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: matchday
optional_parameters.description: Returns all the game for the match day specified

api_list.name: Odds List
api_list.description: Returns the available odds for a match and a bookmaker

api_list.name: League Table
api_list.description: Returns the table for the league

optional_parameters.name: fromdate
optional_parameters.description: Compute the table only with matches played fromdate (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: todate
optional_parameters.description: Compute the table only with matches played fromdate (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to restrict the table compute on home or away games (default all)

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Let to compute the table considering only the first half (FH) or the second time (SH) results. Default is full time (FT).

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify the first match number to use to compute the table (default 1)

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify the last match number to consider to compute the table (default last match number played registered on system)

api_list.name: Match statistics
api_list.description: Returns match statistics

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Player stats for a match
api_list.description: Returns the player's statistics for a match

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Lineups and substitutes for a game
api_list.description: Returns lineups, substitutes and coaches for a game after a while the game is finished.

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Odd quotas
api_list.description: Returns quotas for an odd a match and a bookmaker

api_list.name: Missing players for a match
api_list.description: Returns missing players for a match

api_list.name: Match events
api_list.description: Returns the events for a match (yellow and red cards, substitutions, shots on post and formations module)

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Bet Stats
api_list.description: Returns aggregate data about results, goal-nogoal, underover, 1x2 and totalgoals to support your bet activities

required_parameters.name: bet
required_parameters.description: Type of data required, result, totalgoals,underover,1x2,goalnogoal

optional_parameters.name: fromdate
optional_parameters.description: Only matches fromdate (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: handicap
optional_parameters.description: Handicap values (only for 1x2 bet)

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Together with team parameter, let you to select only games where team has played home, away or all (default)

optional_parameters.name: over
optional_parameters.description: Over values limit, mandatory for underover bet

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Team name

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: Let you to select only first half (FH) result, second half (SH) or full time (FT) default

optional_parameters.name: todate
optional_parameters.description: Only matches todate (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: when
optional_parameters.description: Let you to select only games with win, loss, draw or all (default)

api_list.name: Match scorers
api_list.description: Returns who scored and how for a match

optional_parameters.name: live
optional_parameters.description: Returns data for a playing match (default false)

api_list.name: Bookmakers List
api_list.description: Returns the list of the available bookmakers for a match

api_list.name: League Players
api_list.description: Return all players for a team

api_list.name: Top scorers
api_list.description: Returns top scorers for the league

optional_parameters.name: how
optional_parameters.description: Return only goals scored according the how parameter. Its value can be: left, right, head or any, that is the default.

optional_parameters.name: fromdate
optional_parameters.description: Compute the table only with matches played fromdate (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: todate
optional_parameters.description: Compute the table only with matches played todate (format mmddyyyy)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page result to return. Default is 1 that are results from 1 to 5 (max. value is 20).

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify the first match number to use to compute the result (default 1)

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to restrict the table compute on home or away games (default all)

optional_parameters.name: player
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to get goals number only for the player name specified

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Team name

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify the last match number to consider to compute the result (default last match number played registered on system)
